H0.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Message

H1.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Data

H2.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. Knowledge

H3.text: a synonym for the content component of communication is. information

A4.text: Communication is usually understood as the transmission of information: a message is conveyed from a sender to a receiver using some medium, such as sound, written signs, bodily movements, or electricity.

A5.text: Many models include the idea that a source uses a coding system to express information in the form of a message.
